Package adventure_game

Class Character

java.lang.Object
adventure_game.Character
Direct Known Subclasses:
NPC, Player
public abstract class Character extends Object
Abstract class Character is used to create a character and is extended by Class NPC and Class Player. It contains all the methods used by the two other classes, and is used for the game.

    • Character

      public Character(String name, int health, int mana, int damage)
      The Character() constructor is used to create a new Character
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the character
      health - is the starting health of the character
      mana - is the starting mana of the character
      damage - is the damage the character can do

    • attack

      public void attack(Character other)
      Attack first checks if the other character is invincible, if the other character is invincible, prints a message saying so and ends the method If the other character is not invincible, creates a new random damage modifier to create new damage value. Checks if the other character is vulnerable, and if so, adds a 50% damage boost The napplies damage and prints out a message saying how much damage was dealt
      Parameters:
      other - is the Character recieving the attack

    • defend

      public void defend(Character other)
      Randomly decides between giving a turn of invincibility and boosting damage of the main character (75% chance), or becoming vulnerable to the other character's attack.
      Parameters:
      other - is the Character attacking the main Character (isn't currently used in the code)

    • modifyHealth

      public void modifyHealth(int modifier)
      Adds the modifier to current health, then checks if health is less than zero or is above maxHealth. If it's below zero, sets health to zero and if its above maxHealth, sets it to maxHealth.
      Parameters:
      modifier - the amount of health that will be modified

    • setAsVulnerable

      public void setAsVulnerable(int numTurns)
      Sets the character to be vulnerable for the number of turns
      Parameters:
      numTurns - the number of turns the Character should be set as vulnerable for

    • isVulnerable

      public boolean isVulnerable()
      Checks if vulnerable
      Returns:
      false if not vulnerable, true if vulnerable

    • setTempDamageBuff

      public void setTempDamageBuff(double buff)
      Set the temporary damage buffer. This is a multiplicative factor which will modify the damage for the next attack made by this Character. After the next attack, it will get reset back to 1.0
      Parameters:
      buff - the multiplicative factor for the next attack's damage.

    • obtain

      public void obtain(Consumable item)
      Adds one consumable to the Character's inventory/storage
      Parameters:
      item - the item added to the Character

    • useItem

      public void useItem(Character owner, Character other)
      Parameters:
      owner - the owner of the item being used
      other - the other character the item effects

    • hasItems

      public boolean hasItems()
      Checks if the Character has any items
      Returns:
      false if no items, true if they have items

    • castSpell

      public void castSpell(Character other)
      Cuts the opponents health in half and reduces the players mana by 3
      Parameters:
      other - is the opponent
